title: Kuttipayale Lyrics Inga Enna Solludhu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kuttipayale
Singer(s): STR
Lyricist: STR
Movie: Inga Enna Solludhu
Music: Dharan Kumar

Kuttipayale Kuttipayale
edha thaedi ne odura
chutti payale chutti payale
edhukkaaga ne alayira.

Arivodathaan porakkura
aana valarndhu muttaal aagura.
Kadavula kelvi ketkura,
naan unna unna ketkuren.

Arivillaya arivillaya
konjam kooda arivillaya.
puriyalaya puriyalaya
inga enna solludhunu puriyalaya.

Un kannuku munnadi irukudhu
kannaadi purinjaakkaa neeyumthaan killaadi.
Urundaalum porandaalum, sirichaalum
azhuthaalum adhuthaan un munnadi nadakumada.

Indha vithaya konjam ne kathuko.
purinjikittu unmaya othuko.
Vadivela polathaan kannai munnadi
korangu bomba vela ketkurada..

Uzhagamey maayainu arivendra kanaala
kannaadiya odachaakaa theriyumada.

Arivillaya arivillaya,
konjam kooda arivillaya.
puriyalaya puriyalaya,
inga enna solludhunu puriyalaya.

Adhu ponnaaga irundhaalum pennaaga irundhaalum
thaedi ne ponaakaa kidaikaadhada.
Thaedaama odaama alayaama irundhaakkaa
uzhagamey unakumthaan adimayada.

Nallavanradhu nallavan illada.
kettavan ellaam kettu ponadhillada
nallavanaa irundhaalum
kettavana irundhaalum
kandippaa motcham thaan kidaikaadhada.

Nallavana illaama kettavanaa illaama
naduvula ninnaakkaa kadavulada..

Thiruttu payale thiruttupayale
edha thiruda ne thudikkura.
Kallapayale kallapaye edha nenachi ne
kalangura.

Arivodathaan porakkura
aana valarndhu muttaal aagura.
Kadavula kelvi ketkura,
naan unna unna ketkuren.

Arivillaya arivillaya
konjam kooda arivillaya.
puriyalaya puriyalaya
inga enna solludhunu puriyalaya.
